pr_title: Add name ordering for streams and map based storages

timeline.message: Add name ordering for streams and map based storages

timeline.bodyText: Name could be null for either or both.
timeline.author: EricWittmann

timeline.bodyText: Also maybe throw in an artifact with no name.  In that case the ID should be used as the name.
timeline.author: EricWittmann

timeline.message:
Proposed change to comparator for artifact meta-data

This is what I was thinking for the comparator - what do you think, @carlesarnal ?
